author: Jack
title: when we choose AI stream,what we are really learning about...
text: I actually skipped 9021, but the assignments look surprisingly hard.COMP9020 (intro to computer science, in other words discrete maths) is a level-0 course, and it's a vicious little bastard of a course.The level-0 postgrad courses are basically hazing courses. They're hard as shit, and they're taught absolutely unforgivingly, because they're designed to weed out the people who lack the grit to complete their whole degree.You'll learn a lot, and if Eric Martin is lecturing, he's a great guy. But this is definitely not a training-wheels course.
